sentence.Network_en: The novel has an omniscient narrator.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部小说有一个全知全能的叙述者。

sentence.Network_en: He's nervous when trying to potray himself as omniscient.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他试图把自己描绘得无所不知时，内心其实很紧张。

sentence.Network_en: And the omniscient gentlemen always said, indeed they would.
sentence.Network_cn: 无所不知的男人们就总是说一定会回来的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conscientious a 有责任心的 omniscient a 无所不知的 prescience n 先见之明.
明字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 明察〖 perceive〗 明察秋毫〖 omniscient〗 明澈〖 brightandlimpid〗.
英语词缀 ... omnipotent（ 全能的）, omniscient（ 全知的）, omnidirectional（ 全向的）.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... omnipotent 有无限能力的 omniscient 博识的 omophagia 生食癖.

list.abs: A.Buddha's fearlessness arises from(佛四无所畏) 1. his omniscience正等觉无所畏  2. perfection of character漏永尽无所畏.
...，心里很气愤，看到许多人趣味低俗，而这样等于自己用全知视角（omniscient perspective）打破了自己一开始所设置的第一人称 …

the present paper deals with the logical omniscience problem in epistemic logic and the methods to resolve it and presents a kind of epistemic logic called EL , which can avoid the logical omniscience , and gives its semantic rules and its axioms .摘要分析认知逻

the present paper deals with the logical omniscience problem in epistemic logic and the methods to resolve it and presents a kind of epistemic logic called EL , which can avoid the logical omniscience , and gives its semantic rules and its axioms .摘要分析认知逻

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin omniscient- 'all-knowing', based on scire 'to know'

entry.tran: 全知全能的；无所不知的；博闻广识的
entry.def: If you describe someone as omniscient, you mean they know or seem to know everything.

example.tran: 《金融时报》无所不知的数据搜集网络

auth_sentence.content: 'D have to be omniscient and omnipresent as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'D have to be omniscient and omnipresent as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'D have to be omniscient and omnipresent as well.

auth_sentence.content: She makes no effort to appear omniscient or objective.
auth_sentence.res_content: She makes no effort to appear omniscient or objective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She makes no effort to appear omniscient or objective.

auth_sentence.content: I am the least qualified nor wholly omniscient to say how.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am the least qualified nor wholly omniscient to say how.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am the least qualified nor wholly omniscient to say how.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+ous……的→意识到的
ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
pseudo假+science科学→n.伪科学
sci知道+ence表名词→n.科学;学科
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 创造一切的, 有无限创造力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: omni全部,到处+fic做+ent……的→做出全部东西
omni全部,到处+potent有力的→adj.全能的
omni全部,到处+present出现的→adj.无所不在的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 全知的, 无所不知的
stems_affixes.word_buile: omni全部,到处+scient有知识的→adj.全知的, 无所不知的;n.无所不知者
omni全部,到处+vor吃+ous……的→全吃的
omni全部,到处+bus汽车→n.公共汽车
omni全部,到处+scient有知识的→adj.全知的, 无所不知的;n.无所不知者
omni全部,到处+itude状态→omnitude全的状态→无所不包的
